format: YAML/Makefile-like syntax with Python inherit statements
description: This file is a build configuration snippet for cross-compiling GDB within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system. It specifies dependencies, package configurations, inheritance for build functionalities, and environment setups tailored for cross-compilation.

methods.name: do_compile:prepend()
methods.description: Prepares environment variables for compilation, specifically setting staging library and include directories for native builds.
